data.message:
I don't know if I want to buy this it's not like oh wow it's just Stan on white products :( I hope the other volumes are better, if there is more.
While I hate all politics full stop because politicians just suck in general, I think Em shouldn't go anywhere near politics and just stick to the awesome music he makes I'll still buy his crap it's not like he's said fuck you to his fans before do all you actually listen to his lyrics from his previous albums 😂 😂 😂
